why the game is not saving my progress?

As classic as this game is, it's not worth the time anymore. Even in prime it's plagued with cheaters and MM ranking is as broken as it has been since release. There are no "balanced teams" instead, you'll spend your time praying that you get a smurf or a cheater on your time this time, because in 90% of the matches you'll find one. The higher the rank you are the worse it gets. Valve's anti cheat may be the worst in existence and it's blatantly obvious after the FTP update all they care for in the game is the money made from the skin market.
Good Game Just the Game is to hard to be good at.
